item.dc:creator: Anthony Faustine
item.description: In 2024, I embarked on a journey to read one book per month, resulting in 13 transformative reads. This post reflects on how these books shaped my perspective, covering themes like purpose-driven innovation (Build by Tony Fadell), intentional living (Essentialism by Greg McKeown), mindset shifts (The Magic of Thinking Big by David Schwartz), and resilience (Manâ€™s Search for Meaning by Viktor Frankl). From leadership and negotiation to love and digital minimalism, each book offered unique insights, encouraging personal growth, empathy, and a focus on what truly matters. Join me as I share the lessons learned and their impact on my year.
